metadata.title: John Deere Licensed Glass .4 L Beer Mug (Iron Horse)
description: Enjoy a drink on the farm with these glass beer mugs that are officially licensed by John Deere. They can hold .4 liters. They come in the original box which makes them perfect for gifting.
